page.title: 09NURSERY:HINTON CHARTERHOUSE
page.content: { OLDFIELD NURSERY}IS SITED ON THE A366, N.E. OF NORTON ST. PHILIP, APPROXIMATELY 3 KM. FROM HINTON CHARTERHOUSE. TWELVE PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED HERE, MANAGED BY THE OWNER, A QUALIFIED BOTANIST. THE HALF-ACRE SITE INCLUDES THE OWNER'S HOUSE, 6 GREENHOUSES, EACH FITTED WITH SPRAYING AND HEATING FACILITIES, A POTTING SHED AND PARKING FOR 20 CARS. ALTHOUGH PARKING IS LIMITED, IT IS EXPECTED THAT THE 30 YEAR OLD BUSINESS WILL ATTRACT SOME 20,000 VISITORS DURING 1985. THE FIRM SPECIALISES IN GROWING PLANTS SUITABLE FOR LIMESTONE AREAS. YOUNG PLANTS ARE REARED UNDER COVER, WITH MORE MATURE ONES OUTSIDE. THE GROWING TECHNIQUE INVOLVES SPECIAL CRYSTALS, WHICH ABSORB WATER WHEN WET, AND RELEASE IT IN DRY CONDITIONS. THIS HELPS TO KEEP COSTS TO A MINIMUM.
